title: The Electric company
brief_description: An example of children’s television programming, designed for children with short attention spans. A commercially structured, rapidly moving series of segments dealing with consonant and vowel sounds, word attack skills, structure and context analysis, rhyming patterns and punctuation. Featuring Morgan Freeman and Bill Cosby.
